name: iOS 15 and iPadOS 15
available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory consumption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Siddharth Aeri (@b1n4r1b01)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to read sensitive information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher working with Compartir

advisories.available: devices with Apple Neural Engine: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (3rd generation) and later, iPad Air (3rd generation) and later, and iPad mini (5th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with system privileges on devices with an Apple Neural Engine
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: proteas wang

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A device may be passively tracked by its WiFi MAC address
advisories.description: A user privacy issue was addressed by removing the broadcast MAC address.

cves.credit: Fabien Duchêne of UCLouvain (Belgium)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a malicious audio file may result in unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin (@patch1t) of Trend Micro

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: hjy79425575 working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: devices with Face ID: iPhone X, iPhone XR, iPhone XS (all models), iPhone 11 (all models), iPhone 12 (all models), iPad Pro (11-inch), and iPad Pro (3rd generation)
advisories.impact: A 3D model constructed to look like the enrolled user may be able to authenticate via Face ID
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by improving Face ID anti-spoofing models.

cves.credit: Wish Wu (吴潍浠 @wish_wu) of Ant Group Tianqiong Security Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An attacker with physical access to a device may be able to see private contact information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved permissions logic.

cves.credit: Atharv (@atharv0x0)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application with microphone permission may unexpectedly access microphone input during a FaceTime call
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Adam Bellard and Spencer Reitman of Airtime

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font may result in the disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted dfont file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted dfont file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab
Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab
Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Yinyi Wu (@3ndy1) of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to access photo metadata without needing permission to access photos
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved authentication.

cves.credit: Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Ye Zhang of Baidu Security
Mike Zhang of Pangu Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved locking.

cves.credit: Manish Bhatt of Red Team X @Meta, Zweig of Kunlun Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by updating expat to version 2.4.1.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may disclose memory contents
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Apple

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A VPN configuration may be installed by an app without user permission
advisories.description: An authorization issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Javier Vieira Boccardo (linkedin.com/javier-vieira-boccardo)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application may be able to access restricted files
advisories.description: A validation issue existed in the handling of symlinks. This issue was addressed with improved validation of symlinks.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) and Yuebin Sun (@yuebinsun2020) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) and Yuebin Sun (@yuebinsun2020) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to access some of the user's Apple ID information, or recent in-app search terms
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions on third party applications.

cves.credit: Steven Troughton-Smith of High Caffeine Content (@stroughtonsmith)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Previewing an html file attached to a note may unexpectedly contact remote servers
advisories.description: A logic issue existed in the handling of document loads. This issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Saif Hamed Al Hinai Oman CERT

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved permissions logic.

cves.credit: Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to view contacts from the lock screen
advisories.description: A lock screen issue allowed access to contacts on a locked device. This issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Anshraj Srivastava (@AnshrajSrivas14) of UKEF

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

cves.credit: Rajanish Pathak (@h4ckologic) and Hardik Mehta (@hardw00t)

advisories.available: iPhone SE (1st generation), iPad Pro 12.9-inch, iPad Air 2, iPad (5th generation), and iPad mini 4
advisories.impact: In certain situations, the baseband would fail to enable integrity and ciphering protection
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: CheolJun Park, Sangwook Bae and BeomSeok Oh of KAIST SysSec Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Turning off "Block all remote content" may not apply to all remote content types
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Jonathan Austin of Wells Fargo, Attila Soki

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious website may exfiltrate data cross-origin
advisories.description: An issue existed in the specification for the resource timing API. The specification was updated and the updated specification was implemented.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Visiting a maliciously crafted website may reveal a user's browsing history
advisories.description: The issue was resolved with additional restrictions on CSS compositing.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may disclose restricted memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption vulnerability was addressed with improved locking.

advisories.impact: Visiting a maliciously crafted website may lead to the disclosure of sensitive user information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: An attacker in physical proximity may be able to force a user onto a malicious Wi-Fi network during device setup
